attributes.action: Ban Supermarkets from destroying unsold food & oblige them to give it to charity
attributes.additional_details:
BBC NEWS: Are there a million food bank users?
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/election-2015-32413080

Daily MIRROR: A desperate couple who were arrested for stealing out-of-date food from supermarket bins 
http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/couple-charged-stealing-out-of-date-tesco-5687720

BBC NEWS: Record numbers use food banks 
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-32406120

BBC NEWS: Food bank crisis: 'I can last a week without eating'
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-30379245
attributes.background: The pressure on food banks has increased to its record level. Especially after the recent wave of benefit cut there are hundred of thousand of people struggling to bring food to the table for their families. Considering this it is a limit of selfishness and cruelty to waste massive amount of food

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104753

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
